  • unUTxO ∷ Map (TxIn (EraCrypto era)) (TxOut era)
}
name: UTxO UTxO unUTxO

display_html:
class EraTxBody era ⇒ EraUTxO era where
  • type ScriptsNeeded era = (r ∷ Type) | r → era
  • getConsumedValue ∷ PParams era → (StakeCredential (EraCrypto era) → Maybe Coin) → UTxO era → TxBody era → Value era
  • getScriptsNeeded ∷ UTxO era → TxBody era → ScriptsNeeded era
  • getScriptsHashesNeeded ∷ ScriptsNeeded era → Set (ScriptHash (EraCrypto era))
name: EraUTxO ScriptsNeeded getConsumedValue getScriptsNeeded getScriptsHashesNeeded
